original_title: Walt Disney World Resort: Behind the Scenes
overview: In this exciting program you will get an unprecedented look behind the scenes at many Walt Disney World attractions, including The Haunted Mansion, Mission Space, Rock' n' Roller Coaster and The Seas with Nemo and Friends! This is the story behind the story of how a theme park made Orlando, Florida the nation's number one vacation destination.
title: Walt Disney World Resort: Behind the Scenes
